entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump trump tries to make a “fake news” misquotation from Dr. Robert Redfield’s statement that flu and coronavirus in the fall would be more “difficult” to deal with, rather than “worse.” What does “difficult” lead to, vis-a-vis coronavirus, anyway? A distinction without a difference.
